title: Submitting to Gang Control
description: The player chooses to comply with the Spiral Gang's rules, showing a willingness to submit. This choice leads to Royce and Dum Dum relaxing their intimidation somewhat, allowing the transaction to proceed with a slight increase in price.
dialogue: You nod slowly, feeling the oppressive weight of their gazes lift just a fraction. "Alright, I’ll follow your rules," you say, trying to keep your tone steady. They smirk, a victory in the air. Royce crosses his arms, a glint of approval in his eyes.

npc_reactions.Royce: Royce leans back, visibly pleased. "Smart choice. We can do business, then."
npc_reactions.Dum Dum: Dum Dum grins, revealing teeth like a predator. "Good. I like compliance... it makes things so much easier for everyone."

player_options: Proceed with the transaction at the increased price.
Ask if there's a way to negotiate a better deal.
Request a showcase of the robot before finalizing the deal.

title: Challenging the Gang
description: The player boldly refuses to adhere to the Spiral Gang's rules, standing firm against Royce and Dum Dum. This decision sparks a confrontation, escalating the tension in the room.
dialogue: You shake your head defiantly. "I won’t follow your rules. I don’t fear you or your gang!" Royce’s expression darkens as Dum Dum flexes his muscles, the air around you crackling with danger.

npc_reactions.Royce: Royce’s smile fades, replaced by rage. "You think you can just walk in here and refuse us?"
npc_reactions.Dum Dum: Dum Dum steps forward, cracking his knuckles. "You’re gonna regret that decision, buddy!"

player_options: Prepare for a fight with Royce and Dum Dum.
Attempt to reason with them despite the tension.
Look for an escape route before things get violent.

title: Offered a New Deal
description: In a surprising twist, the player attempts to negotiate new terms that might benefit both parties. This unexpected action catches Royce and Dum Dum off guard, leading to a tense but potentially fruitful discussion.
dialogue: You take a step back, gathering your thoughts. "What if we adjusted the terms? I could offer a better deal if you let me see the robot first." The gang members exchange glances of confusion and intrigue.

npc_reactions.Royce: Royce tilts his head, considering your offer. "Now there’s something I didn’t expect..."
npc_reactions.Dum Dum: Dum Dum looks skeptical but intrigued. "You think you can get more out of us? You’ve got guts, I’ll give you that."

player_options: Suggest a trial period with the robot before final payment.
Offer to bring a third party to negotiate for better terms.
Propose helping them with a job in exchange for a fair deal.
